response.overview: Five years ago, Richard embarked on an amazing journey in memory of his son Emilio and in honor of all children with cancer. This epic run was captured by Executive Producers, Sholom & Lynn Ellenberg, making it into a short documentary called Running With Emilio. This beautiful and inspirational film has participated in and won several film festival awards around the world, including the Brooklyn International Short Awards, the Big Apple Film Festival in New York, Santa Monica Film Awards, Seattle Filmmaker Awards, Austin International Art Festival.
response.title: RUNNING WITH EMILIO
